articles.title: DPRK Proposes Talks on Resumption of Tour
articles.content:
DPRK Proposes Talks on Resumption of Tour
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee Thursday sent a notice to the "Ministry of Unification" of south Korea requesting it to hold a north-south working contact for the resumption of tour of Mt. Kumgang and the area of Kaesong.
					 It is very regrettable that tour of Mt. Kumgang and the area of Kaesong has been suspended for one and a half years, the notice said, proposing holding the north-south working contact for the resumption of tour at Mt. Kumgang Resort on Jan. 26 and 27.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Equatorial Guinean Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Equatorial Guinean Ambassador
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday met and had a talk with Narciso Ntugu Abeso Oyana, ambassador of Equatorial Guinea to the DPRK, who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Croatian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Croatian President
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Ivo Josipovic upon his election as president of Croatia.
					 Kim in the message wished him success in his work for the stability and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: An Tong Chun Appointed New Minister of Culture
articles.content:
An Tong Chun Appointed New Minister of Culture
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Kang Nung Su was relieved of the post of the minister of Culture of the DPRK and An Tong Chun was appointed to replace him as the former was transferred to other post, according to the decrees promulgated by the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK Wednesday.

articles.title: Reception Given for Chinese Embassies
articles.content:
Reception Given for Chinese Embassies
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The International Affairs Department of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea hosted a reception for the staff members of the Chinese embassy here on the occasion of the New Year at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Thursday. 
					 Present there on invitation were Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Xiaoming and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 On hand were Kim Yong Il, department director of the C.C., WPK, Kim Song Nam, vice department director of the C.C., WPK, and officials concerned.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Spreads to Centenarians
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Spreads to Centenarians
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Birthday spreads sent by General Secretary Kim Jong Il were conveyed to women centenarians Sin Jong Suk residing in Mangyongdae District, Pyongyang and Yu Nam Ho residing in Namsan-ri, Phyongwon County, South Phyongan Province.
					 Subjected to all sorts of maltreatment and insult after being born as members of the stateless nation, they could not lead a genuine life and happiness till President Kim Il Sung liberated the country.
					
					 They worked hard with their single desire to repay the benevolence shown by the Workers' Party of Korea and the leader for them. They have kept themselves busy even since they became pensioners.
					
					 They are leading an optimistic life in good health, having balanced diet.

articles.title: DPRK Acrobats Prove Successful in Intl Acrobatic Festival
articles.content:
DPRK Acrobats Prove Successful in Intl Acrobatic Festival
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The 26th "Golden Circus" International Circus Festival took place in Rome between Dec. 23 last year and Jan. 10 this year.
					 The festival brought together excellent acrobats from the DPRK, Russia, Ukraine, Germany, Italy and many other countries and regions.
					
					 Kim Chol Guk, Hwang Kum Hui, Kim Chol Jun, Ko Myong Hyok and others in their "Aerial Trapeze" successfully presented aerial stunts requiring high technique such as quadruple flip-flap with simultaneous pirouette and treble flip-flap in the air.
					
					 The DPRK's "Aerial Trapeze" was awarded Gold Prize of Colosseum, the top prize of the festival, for obtaining the first place at the awarding ceremony held on Jan. 10.
					
					  Silver Prize of Colosseum, the prize for the second place, went to the DPRK's "Duet Etude" and Rome City Prize, the prize for the third place, to the DPRK's "Trio Pole Feat".
					
					 A "special gold medal of the presidency of the Republic of Italy" to be conferred upon the best group on behalf of the Italian president was awarded to the DPRK acrobatic group.

articles.title: Scientists Eager to Perform Duty for This Year
articles.content:
Scientists Eager to Perform Duty for This Year
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The joint New Year editorial of leading newspapers of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea says that the key to making a fresh leap forward in this year's general offensive is to launch a vigorous campaign for pushing back the frontiers of science and technology in all sectors.
					 In response to the joint editorial the scientific and research institutes have put spurs to their work from the beginning of the year.
					
					 In particular, the branch academies of light industrial science and biology and the academy of agricultural science are directing their efforts to solving scientific and technological problems arising at light industry factories and co-op farms and introducing already-made research findings into practice.
					
					 Scientists and technicians in the branch academy of railway engineering and institutes of control machinery and heat engineering, etc. are pushing ahead with ambitious and large projects for developing such important technological domains as mechanical, metal and heat engineering rapidly.
					
					 Many of them have visited factories and enterprises to help them enhance their own abilities to develop new technologies and products by bringing science and technology close to production.
					
					 The mass technological innovation movement has been invigorated at factories and enterprises.
					
					 Scientists and technicians, with a firm resolution to fully discharge their responsibility and duty in the current general offensive for improvement of the people's living standard, are concentrating their effort on rapidly developing core technologies, technical engineering of major sectors and basic science with a correct strategy for the development of science and technology as required by the 21st century.

articles.title: Sa Ok Jin, Famous Taekwon-Do Star
articles.content:
Sa Ok Jin, Famous Taekwon-Do Star
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea, native country of Taekwon-Do, is boasting of a lot of  celebrated Taekwon-Do players who have displayed national wisdom and mettle in international tournaments.
					 Among them is Sa Ok Jin, a 24-year-old female player of the national team who bagged five gold medals at the 75kg sparring, fourth grade pattern, demonstration show, team pattern and team sparring and won the technical prize in the 16th World Taekwon-Do Championships held in Juche 98 (2009).
					
					 She, who had also achieved excellent results in the 14th and 15th World Taekwon-Do Championships and other international tournaments, was selected as one of the country's best Taekwon-Do players in 2004, 2005 and 2009.
					
					 Being a world star, she is still absorbed in training with a higher goal.

articles.title: Struggle for Independence, Democracy, Reunification Called for
articles.content:
Struggle for Independence, Democracy, Reunification Called for
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- In order to achieve signal success in the movement for national reunification this year the south Korean people should wage a more dynamic just patriotic struggle for independence, democracy and reunification.
					 This call is made by Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a signed article.
					
					 The present conservative ruling forces of south Korea are desperately pursuing sycophancy toward the U.S., fascist dictatorship and anti-reunification acts and confrontation, while working hard to dampen the daily growing desire of the people for independence, democracy and reunification, the article notes, adding that the reality urgently requires the south Korean people to wage a more courageous mass struggle to realize the above-said desire. 
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 What is most important is to intensify the struggle for independence against the U.S. in south Korea. 
					
					 Without forcing the U.S. forces to withdraw from south Korea its people can never achieve sovereignty. It is necessary to dynamically wage diverse forms of the anti-U.S. struggle for driving the U.S. imperialist aggression forces out of south Korea and further intensify the struggle for peace against war, the action condemning the U.S. joint military exercises and arms buildup targeted against the DPRK, factors of sparking the danger of a nuclear war. 
					
					 The south Korean people should launch a mass struggle under the banner of anti-fascism and democracy and thus decisively foil the repressive moves of the dictatorial forces and bury underground the departed soul of the fascists so that they may never raise their heads again.
					
					 It is necessary to steadily advance the movement for national reunification under the banner of the inter-Korean declarations.
					
					 The organizations of the reunification movement and people of different strata in south Korea should wage a more dynamic struggle to force the south Korean authorities to roll back their policy of confrontation with the DPRK this year marking the 10th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration and the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo. It is also necessary to intensify the movement for national reunification with emphasis on supporting the process for improving the inter-Korean relations and stirring up the atmosphere of national reconciliation and cooperation, concludes the article.

articles.title: Realization of Cause of Global Independence Called for
articles.content:
Realization of Cause of Global Independence Called for
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The world people advocating independence should wage a dynamic struggle for global independence.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday stresses this in a signed article.
					
					 The most correct leadership over the cause of global independence can be provided only by the great leader and independent world be built only with the united strength of the world people advocating independence, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il made public many works in which he clearly indicated the ways for the human cause of independence to follow such as the revolutionary character and essence of the cause of global independence and its goal and the appearance of independent world and led only to victory the struggle of the progressives to realize global independence with his outstanding leadership.
					
					 The world people should unite under the banner of independence in order to win victory in the struggle to defend independence.
					
					 It is important to establish a new international order based on justice, equality and impartiality while frustrating high-handed and arbitrary practices and hegemonic moves on the part of the imperialists to realize global independence.
					
					 One should not harbor even the slightest illusion about the imperialists but fight it out against them, maintaining a principled stand.
					
					 It is also important to further strengthen the non-aligned movement under the banner of independence against imperialism.
					
					 Independence, peace and friendship are the noble ideas and fundamental principles that should be held fast to by the progressives in the struggle to realize global independence.
					
					 The DPRK will wage a more valiant struggle to realize global independence.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Anti-reunification Deed Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Anti-reunification Deed Blasted
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions released a statement on Jan. 11, denouncing the puppet authorities for unreasonably obstructing the non-governmental reunification movement.
					 The statement referred to the fact that on the same day the "Ministry of Unification" disallowed the confederation delegation's request for visit to Pyongyang under such pretexts as "the present situation of south-north relations and guarantee of safety" and "maintenance of order".
					
					 This behavior is intended to hinder and stifle the cooperation and exchange between workers in the south and the north, it pointed out, urging the present "government" to immediately stop the suppression of the non-governmental reunification movement and open the way of the confederation to Pyongyang.
					
					 It warned that the authorities will be bound to meet a miserable end if they continue to take the road of confrontation, persistently denying the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration supported by all the fellow countrymen.
					
					 The confederation will continue to promote the cooperation and exchange for implementing the said declarations despite the authorities' crackdown and consolidate the mass foundation for reconciliation and unity and co-prosperity of the nation by expanding the movement for reunification on industrial and regional terms, the statement declared.

articles.title: Struggle for Settlement of Ryongsan Tragedy Urged
articles.content:
Struggle for Settlement of Ryongsan Tragedy Urged
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- A funeral service for Ryongsan evacuees brutally killed by the puppet police was held at the Seoul Station plaza in south Korea on Jan. 9.
					 Present there were the "Committee for All-People Funeral Service for Popular Martyrs, Evacuees Killed in Ryongsan Tragedy", the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, bereaved families, religionists, representatives of opposition parties and citizens from all walks of life, more than 5,000 all told.
					
					 The participants deplored that it is nearly one year since evacuees in Ryongsan were mercilessly killed due to the authorities' murderous "redevelopment" policy and fascist suppression, but it has not yet been made to punish the chief culprit for the killing and probe the truth about it.
					
					 They charged that even after the Ryongsan tragedy the tyrannical "government" has engaged itself in the repressive rule such as crackdown upon the Ssangyong Motors Trade Union, the Government Employees' Union and the Teachers Union, violation of freedom of speech, enforcement of "readjustment of four large rivers", etc.
					
					 They strongly demanded that the authorities make a sincere apology for the killing, though belatedly, and take fundamental measures to prevent recurrence of such tragedy.
					
					 They called for fighting it out for an end to the authorities' unpopular "redevelopment" policy and settlement of the Ryongsan tragedy, cherishing the outcry of the victims.

articles.title: Koreans in China Urged to Strive for Prosperity of Homeland
articles.content:
Koreans in China Urged to Strive for Prosperity of Homeland
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Choe Un Bok, chairperson of the General Association of Koreans in China, on Jan. 5 made public a statement titled "Let us more vigorously struggle for the prosperity and the independent reunification of our homeland under the Songun revolutionary leadership of respected General Secretary Kim Jong Il".
					 The statement noted with high appreciation that  Kim Jong Il worked out grand plans and operations for bringing about a decisive phase in the Korean revolution and the building of a thriving nation by effecting a new great revolutionary surge and wisely led the efforts of the army and the people last year.
					
					 It is the shining fruition of his wise leadership that last year the people in the homeland achieved the great victory in defending socialism and building a thriving nation and wrought admirable miracles and innovations in different sectors of the national economy, weathering out the harsh tempest of history, it said.
					
					 The statement expressed the determination to closely rally the broad strata of Koreans in China around the association and vigorously arouse them to the patriotic drive for national reunification in keeping pace with the people in the homeland working hard to carry out the militant tasks laid down in the joint New Year editorial.
					
					 All Koreans in China will turn out as one in the struggle to resolutely smash the anti-DPRK and anti-reunification moves of the pro-U.S. conservative ruling forces of south Korea and achieve the independent reunification of the country by intensifying the struggle for peace against the U.S. and war, it said.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Mexico
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Organizes and Guides All the Victories of Our People" was brought out in booklet on January 8 by the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism.
					 The work, published on October 3, Juche 79 (1990), clarifies the idea that the party's leadership is a decisive guarantee for victory of the socialist cause, the matter of strengthening and developing the WPK into a revolutionary party of Juche-type, the fundamental ways for the party to discharge its mission and duty as a leading political organization and so on.

articles.title: Korean Struggle Supported by Indian Organization
articles.content:
Korean Struggle Supported by Indian Organization
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association issued a statement on January 7 in support of the joint New Year editorial of the DPRK.
					 Last year the DPRK demonstrated its might, decisively overcoming every blockade by the U.S. and other hostile forces, the statement noted, adding: This would have been unthinkable without the wise leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il pursuing the Songun politics.
					
					 It said that the association considers "Bring about a radical turn in the people's standard of living by accelerating the development of light industry and agriculture once again this year that marks the 65th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea!", a slogan laid down in the joint editorial, to be for providing the Korean people with happier life and joins the world progressive people in fully supporting it.
					
					 This year marks the 10th publication anniversary of the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, the statement said, demanding that the south Korean authorities refrain from aggravating the confrontation and tension, respect the joint declaration and come out to the road for dialogue between the north and the south and improvement of their relations.
					
					 The statement stressed that the association would continue to extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in the struggle for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country this year marking the 10th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.

articles.title: CCPAP envia aviso al "Ministerio de Reunificacion" del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CCPAP envia aviso al "Ministerio de Reunificacion" del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 14 de enero (ATCC) -- El Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico envio el dia 14 al "Ministerio de Reunificacion" del Sur de Corea un aviso de tener el contacto de expertos del Norte y el Sur para reanudar el turismo al monte Kumgang y la zona de Kaesong.
					Es una cosa muy lamentable el que tal turismo se haya interrumpido durante un ano y medio, senala el aviso y propone tener los dias 26 y 27 en el monte Kumgang el contacto de expertos Norte-Sur para reanudarlo.

articles.title: An Tong Chun nombrado como nuevo ministro de Cultura
articles.content:
An Tong Chun nombrado como nuevo ministro de Cultura
Pyongyang, 14 de enero (ATCC) -- Segun los decretos fechados 13 del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, An Tong Chun fue nombrado como nuevo ministro de Cultura en sustitucion de Kang Nung Su, que fue removido para otro cargo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a luchar por independencia y democracia
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a luchar por independencia y democracia
Pyongyang, 14 de enero (ATCC) -- Los habitantes surcoreanos deben dinamizar la patriotica y justa lucha por la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion para lograr exitos radicales en el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria de este ano.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este jueves y continua:
					
					Las actuales fuerzas conservadoras en el poder del Sur de Corea practican obstinadamente el servilismo a Estados Unidos, la dictadura fascista y la campana de confrontacion de caracter anti-reunificacion sofocando la cada dia mas creciente aspiracion del pueblo a la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion.
					
					La realidad urge que los pueblos surcoreanos libren con mas audacia su lucha masiva por esos tres postulados.
					
					Lo mas importante es intensificar la lucha antiyanqui y por la independencia en el Sur de Corea.
					
					Sin la retirada de las tropas norteamericanas del suelo surcoreano no hay la soberania de los habitantes surcoreanos. 
					
					Es imperioso desplegar con mayor intensidad las luchas antiyanquis de distintas formas por expulsar a las tropas agresoras norteamericanas del Sur de Corea y la campana antibelica por la paz con el fin de condenar los ejercicios militares conjuntos anti-RPDC y el aumento armamentista de EE.UU. que generan el peligro de guerra nuclear.
					
					Los habitantes surcoreanos deben asestar un rotundo contragolpe a la represion violenta de las fuerzas dictatoriales librando la lucha masiva bajo la bandera de democratizacion antifascista, de modo que desaparezca para siempre el fantasma de fascismo en renacimiento.
					
					Se debe impulsar energicamente el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria bajo la bandera de la declaracion conjunta Norte-Sur.
					
					Las entidades del movimiento por la reunificacion y los habitantes de distintos sectores del Sur de Corea deberan dinamizar en este ano, en que se celebraran el 10o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y el 30o aniversario de la presentacion del Proyecto de la Fundacion de la Republica Federal Democratica de Coryo, la lucha por forzar a las autoridades surcoreanas a abandonar su politica conflictiva con la RPDC. 
					
					Al mismo tiempo, tienen que vigorizar el movimiento en cuestion dando enfoque en el apoyo al mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas y en el calentamiento del ambiente de reconciliacion y cooperacion nacionales.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a luchar por verificar independencia en el mundo
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a luchar por verificar independencia en el mundo
Pyongyang, 14 de enero (ATCC) -- En un articulo individual difundido el dia 14, el rotativo Rodong Sinmun exhorto a los pueblos del mundo, que defienden la independencia, a luchar dinamicamente por cumplir la causa de verificacion de la independencia en el mundo.
					La mas correcta direccion sobre dicha causa sera asegurada solo por el gran lider y la construccion del mundo independiente sera posible solo con las fuerzas unidas de los pueblos del mundo que abogan por la independencia, comenzo el articulista y continuo:
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il ilumino claramente en sus numerosas obras el camino a seguir por la causa de independencia de la humanidad al precisar el caracter revolucionario, la esencia y la meta de esta causa, el aspecto del mundo independiente, etc.
					
					Ademas, mediante su extraordinaria direccion, condujo a la unica senda de victorias la lucha de la humanidad progresista por verificar la independencia en el mundo.
					
					Para triunfar en esta lucha, los pueblos del mundo deben unirse bajo la bandera de independencia.
					
					Para el cumplimiento de la causa en cuestion, resulta importante que se establezca un nuevo orden internacional, basado en la justicia, la igualdad y la imparcialidad, frustrando el autoritarismo, el despotismo y las maniobras dominacionistas de los imperialistas.
					
					Hay que luchar resueltamente hasta el final contra los imperialistas sin hacerse ni la menor ilusion de ellos, y manteniendo la posicion de principios.
					
					Es preciso intensificar aun mas el Movimiento de los No Alineados bajo la bandera de independencia antiimperialista.
					
					La independencia, la paz y la amistad son el noble ideal y el principio fundamental que deben mantener los pueblos progresistas en su lucha por la independencia del mundo.
					
					La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea redoblara tambien sus esfuerzos por cumplir esa causa.
